column4: im having trouble getting ubuntu to recognize my usb wireless card. It is netgear wna1100

forget it, I tried 5 combinations of cards (USB and PCI) including yours and dlinks/ciscos, and all I got were dead ends, until I found this one: http://www.newegg.ca/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833166056
it works right out of the box, no drivers necessary, just so you know... and the signal is very strong, even in basement like me
